item.title: Judges say unsolicited pizza deliveries are meant to intimidate them
item.description: Judges in several states say they have faced threats and intimidation tactics associated with pizza deliveries.

item.title: The hidden ways Trump, DOGE are shutting down parts of the U.S. government
item.description: Limits on spending have incapacitated parts of agencies as varied as the National Park Service and the Pentagon.

item.title: Ruben Gallego’s tough talk in Pennsylvania visit adds to 2028 chatter
item.description: Democrats are hoping to tap into Ruben Gallego’s playbook to win back working-class voters far beyond the Arizona senator’s home state.
